CITY PARK

CITY PARK
---------


**PARK BENCHES
![Albert Dutch Strzelczyk Sr. 1st Mayor of St Hedwig 1981-2000 - Copy](https://sainthedwigcity.com/Albert%20Dutch%20Strzelczyk%20Sr.%201st%20Mayor%20of%20St%20Hedwig%201981-2000%20-%20Copy.jpg?t=202303201128590)**
Park benches are 6 ft. long, made of recycled plastic, and are guaranteed against breakage for 50 years.
Each bench includes 2 lines of 3" high engraved personalized text, maximum 32 characters per line.
Includes installation on any available concrete bench pad, of Donor's choice, located along the walking paths in the park.
**CONTACT CITY HALL:**
210-667-9568
[cityhall@sainthedwigcity.com](mailto:cityhall@sainthedwigcity.com)
